code:
import projectImage1 from './assets/images/ecommerce.png';
import projectImage2 from './assets/images/linscriptum.png';
import projectImage3 from './assets/images/lotusai.png';
const projects = [{
  id: 1,
  title: 'Ecommerce Store',
  shortDescription: 'A brief description of Project 1.',
  fullDescription: 'This eCommerce app offers a highly customizable and dynamic shopping experience tailored to the needs of various companies. Key features include:

' + 'Dynamic Color Schemes: Each company can personalize the app's appearance with unique color schemes to match their branding.
' + 'Customizable Categories and Products: Easily manage and update product categories and listings, allowing for a versatile product catalog.
' + 'Theme Variability: Users can choose from a range of themes to enhance their shopping experience, with options to switch themes based on preferences or promotions.
' + 'User Management: Support for diverse user profiles, including customers, vendors, and administrators, each with tailored access and functionality.
' + 'Advanced Search and Filtering: Users can quickly find products through advanced search options and filtering criteria.
' + 'Responsive Design: The app is fully responsive, ensuring a seamless shopping experience across various devices and screen sizes.
' + 'Real-time Inventory Updates: Keep inventory levels updated in real-time to prevent overselling and ensure availability.
' + 'Secure Payment Integration: Incorporates secure payment gateways for safe and reliable transactions.
' + 'Order Tracking: Allows users to track their orders from placement to delivery.
' + 'Analytics and Reporting: Provides detailed insights and reports on sales, user behavior, and product performance.

' + 'This app combines flexibility with powerful features to deliver an engaging and efficient eCommerce platform for any company.',
  image: projectImage1
}, {
  id: 2,
  title: 'Linscriptum',
  shortDescription: 'A brief description of Project 2.',
  fullDescription: 'Linscriptum is a comprehensive medical application designed to streamline the process of managing healthcare needs. Key features include:

' + 'Medicine Ordering: Users can order medicine directly through the app, ensuring convenience and accessibility.
' + 'Prescription Management: Users can obtain and manage prescriptions from both pharmacies and doctors.
' + 'Order History and Medication Tracking: Users can view their complete order history and keep track of their medication schedules.
' + 'Chat Functionality: The app supports real-time chat with doctors and pharmacies, facilitating easy communication and consultation.

' + 'Linscriptum integrates these features into a seamless user experience, making healthcare management more efficient and user-friendly.',
  image: projectImage2
}, {
  id: 3,
  title: 'Lotus Ai',
  shortDescription: 'A brief description of Project 3.',
  fullDescription: 'A reliable time tracking tool designed specifically for legal professionals, with client confidentiality as the top priority.

' + 'Lotus ensures precise and accurate documentation while upholding the highest levels of trust and security.
' + 'Key features include:

' + 'Intuitive Design: An easy-to-use interface that seamlessly integrates with your existing systems, simplifying the process of capturing billable hours.
' + 'Client Confidentiality: Maintains the strictest standards of privacy and security to protect client information.
' + 'Effortless Integration: Fits smoothly into your current workflow, ensuring minimal disruption and maximum efficiency.
' + 'Accurate Time Tracking: Guarantees precise documentation of hours worked, enhancing billing accuracy and financial management.
' + 'Customizable Settings: Allows for adjustments to meet the specific needs and preferences of your practice.
' + 'Reliable Performance: Built to handle the demands of a legal practice, offering consistent and dependable operation.

' + 'With Lotus, you can focus on your legal work while relying on a time tracking tool that respects your need for confidentiality and accuracy.',
  image: projectImage3
}];
export default projects;

sourcesContent:
import projectImage1 from './assets/images/ecommerce.png';
import projectImage2 from './assets/images/linscriptum.png';
import projectImage3 from './assets/images/lotusai.png';

const projects = [
    {
        id: 1,
        title: 'Ecommerce Store',
        shortDescription: 'A brief description of Project 1.',
        fullDescription: 'This eCommerce app offers a highly customizable and dynamic shopping experience tailored to the needs of various companies. Key features include:\n\n' +
            'Dynamic Color Schemes: Each company can personalize the app\'s appearance with unique color schemes to match their branding.\n' +
            'Customizable Categories and Products: Easily manage and update product categories and listings, allowing for a versatile product catalog.\n' +
            'Theme Variability: Users can choose from a range of themes to enhance their shopping experience, with options to switch themes based on preferences or promotions.\n' +
            'User Management: Support for diverse user profiles, including customers, vendors, and administrators, each with tailored access and functionality.\n' +
            'Advanced Search and Filtering: Users can quickly find products through advanced search options and filtering criteria.\n' +
            'Responsive Design: The app is fully responsive, ensuring a seamless shopping experience across various devices and screen sizes.\n' +
            'Real-time Inventory Updates: Keep inventory levels updated in real-time to prevent overselling and ensure availability.\n' +
            'Secure Payment Integration: Incorporates secure payment gateways for safe and reliable transactions.\n' +
            'Order Tracking: Allows users to track their orders from placement to delivery.\n' +
            'Analytics and Reporting: Provides detailed insights and reports on sales, user behavior, and product performance.\n\n' +
            'This app combines flexibility with powerful features to deliver an engaging and efficient eCommerce platform for any company.',
        image: projectImage1,
    },
    {
        id: 2,
        title: 'Linscriptum',
        shortDescription: 'A brief description of Project 2.',
        fullDescription: 'Linscriptum is a comprehensive medical application designed to streamline the process of managing healthcare needs. Key features include:\n\n' +
            'Medicine Ordering: Users can order medicine directly through the app, ensuring convenience and accessibility.\n' +
            'Prescription Management: Users can obtain and manage prescriptions from both pharmacies and doctors.\n' +
            'Order History and Medication Tracking: Users can view their complete order history and keep track of their medication schedules.\n' +
            'Chat Functionality: The app supports real-time chat with doctors and pharmacies, facilitating easy communication and consultation.\n\n' +
            'Linscriptum integrates these features into a seamless user experience, making healthcare management more efficient and user-friendly.',
        image: projectImage2,
    },
    {
        id: 3,
        title: 'Lotus Ai',
        shortDescription: 'A brief description of Project 3.',
        fullDescription: 'A reliable time tracking tool designed specifically for legal professionals, with client confidentiality as the top priority.\n\n' +
            'Lotus ensures precise and accurate documentation while upholding the highest levels of trust and security.\n' +
            'Key features include:\n\n' +
            'Intuitive Design: An easy-to-use interface that seamlessly integrates with your existing systems, simplifying the process of capturing billable hours.\n' +
            'Client Confidentiality: Maintains the strictest standards of privacy and security to protect client information.\n' +
            'Effortless Integration: Fits smoothly into your current workflow, ensuring minimal disruption and maximum efficiency.\n' +
            'Accurate Time Tracking: Guarantees precise documentation of hours worked, enhancing billing accuracy and financial management.\n' +
            'Customizable Settings: Allows for adjustments to meet the specific needs and preferences of your practice.\n' +
            'Reliable Performance: Built to handle the demands of a legal practice, offering consistent and dependable operation.\n\n' +
            'With Lotus, you can focus on your legal work while relying on a time tracking tool that respects your need for confidentiality and accuracy.',

        image: projectImage3,
    },
];

export default projects;
